data.text: Help the kingfisher catch some fish. Type the correct word in the space provided. Then click 'Submit'.
data.Question: Pakistan became an independent country on 14 __________ 1947.
Laws cannot be passed without the approval of the __________.
The head of the government is called the __________ minister.
The chief minister is the head of the __________ government.
Laws and other important matters are debated in the National __________.
Each political party has its own __________ and its own ideas.
The __________ is the head of state.
The __________ makes sure that the provincial government is following the rules of the constitution.
The __________ is a set of rules which everyone in the country must follow.
Democracy means rule by the __________.
data.feedback: Oh no! That's not correct. Please try again.
